headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed values: multipart/form-data , application/json . When upload_type is set to FILE , use multipart/form-data .

parameters.name: upload_type
parameters.description: The upload type. Enum values: FILE , URL

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The file type. Enum values: image , music , video , playable

parameters.name: file Conditional
parameters.description: The file that you want to upload. Required when upload_type is set to FILE . The maximum size of a file that you can upload is 100 MB. Note : To upload a customized music file that can be used in Carousel Ads , the file that you specify through this field should meet the following specifications requirements: File Type: MP3. File Size: no greater than 10 MB.

parameters.name: url Conditional
parameters.description: The URL of the file that you want to upload, in the format of “http://xxx.xxx”. Required when upload_type is URL .

parameters.name: signature Conditional
parameters.description: The MD5 value of the file, used as a checksum to check data integrity by the server side. Required when upload_type is FILE .
